remarks: A simplified set of assumptions to show that a given function is simple.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2014.)
statement:
i1fd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
i1fd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ran F e. Fin ) $.
i1fd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ran F \ { 0 } ) ) -> ( `' F " { x } ) e. dom vol ) $.
i1fd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ran F \ { 0 } ) ) -> ( vol ` ( `' F " { x } ) ) e. RR ) $.
i1fd $p |- ( ph -> F e. dom S.1 ) $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
